content.raw:
Any more details on this?

@BillBlank any ideas?
content.html:
Any more details on this?

@BillBlank any ideas?

content.raw: We do not have a v5 model just yet, but there is a noticeable offset between the hands and the atlas skeletons.  The hands in the v4 model were skewed from the center axis of the arm, however in the v5 model I think the hand mount is directly on axis with the arm.
content.html: We do not have a v5 model just yet, but there is a noticeable offset between the hands and the atlas skeletons. The hands in the v4 model were skewed from the center axis of the arm, however in the v5 model I think the hand mount is directly on axis with the arm.

content.raw:
Yes, the hand mount is directly on axis with the arm.  That is why the wrx joint on v4 has an offset but the wrx joint on v5 is 0,0,0.

Am I misunderstanding the issue?
content.html:
Yes, the hand mount is directly on axis with the arm. That is why the wrx joint on v4 has an offset but the wrx joint on v5 is 0,0,0.

Am I misunderstanding the issue?

content.raw:
atlas_v5_robotiq_hands.urdf.xacro has the following config for the robotiq hands. 

 <xacro:robotiq_hand prefix="l_" parent="l_hand" reflect="-1">
    <origin rpy="3.14159 3.14159 3.14159" xyz="-0.00125 0.17 0.01"/>
  </xacro:robotiq_hand>
  <xacro:robotiq_hand prefix="r_" parent="r_hand" reflect="1">
    <origin rpy="3.14159 0 0" xyz="-0.00125 -0.17 0.01"/>
  </xacro:robotiq_hand>


it should instead be the following in order to mount the hands on the axis.  I am unsure if the 0.17 value is accurate since we do not yet have the robot:

<xacro:robotiq_hand prefix="l_" parent="l_hand" reflect="-1">
    <origin rpy="3.14159 3.14159 3.14159" xyz="0 0.17 0"/>
  </xacro:robotiq_hand>
  <xacro:robotiq_hand prefix="r_" parent="r_hand" reflect="1">
    <origin rpy="3.14159 0 0" xyz="0 -0.17 0"/>
  </xacro:robotiq_hand>
content.html:
atlas_v5_robotiq_hands.urdf.xacro has the following config for the robotiq hands.

<xacro:robotiq_hand prefix="l_" parent="l_hand" reflect="-1"> <origin rpy="3.14159 3.14159 3.14159" xyz="-0.00125 0.17 0.01"/> </xacro:robotiq_hand> <xacro:robotiq_hand prefix="r_" parent="r_hand" reflect="1"> <origin rpy="3.14159 0 0" xyz="-0.00125 -0.17 0.01"/> </xacro:robotiq_hand>

it should instead be the following in order to mount the hands on the axis. I am unsure if the 0.17 value is accurate since we do not yet have the robot:

<xacro:robotiq_hand prefix="l_" parent="l_hand" reflect="-1"> <origin rpy="3.14159 3.14159 3.14159" xyz="0 0.17 0"/> </xacro:robotiq_hand> <xacro:robotiq_hand prefix="r_" parent="r_hand" reflect="1"> <origin rpy="3.14159 0 0" xyz="0 -0.17 0"/> </xacro:robotiq_hand>
